episode: I received an award at work for my production and I am extremely proud and becoming more and more confident in my skills at my new job.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I received an award at work for my production and I am extremely proud and becoming more and more confident in my skills at my new job.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's fantastic! Your hard work is paying off.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really is.  I was so unsure of myself when I started because this is a brand new job and something I have never done before so it is awesome to see my hard work paying off and receiving some praise.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Well-deserved recognition can be a huge boost, isn't it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really can be!  I find that it fuels me and motivates me to keep working hard and working to reach my full potential.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's the perfect mindset! Keep shining!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It makes me really feel that I can achieve whatever I put my mind to because I was so unsure of myself and lacked a lot of confidence when I started.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What a wonderful transformation!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really has been.  I have received a lot of positivity and support along the way and am really glad I accepted this position because I was very undecided when I did.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad you took the leap of faith!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am too.  I do not want to get complacent though.  Any suggestions for me to make sure that does not happen?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Set new goals and keep pushing yourself!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is a good idea.  I do need to set some new goals.  I tend to set goals and do a good job of working towards them until they are met.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're a goal-achiever! Keep raising the bar!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Very good idea.  I would definitely welcome new challenges and new levels of responsibility at work.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ambition is a great quality to have!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is something I struggled with when I was younger but I find that I am doing a much better job with it now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Personal growth is amazing, isn't it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really is. Definitely makes me want to continue pushing.  Thank you for the kind words and the motivation!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Keep soaring!
